org.drip.analytics.eventday

Class Fixed

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.analytics.eventday.Base
      • org.drip.analytics.eventday.Fixed

  • public class Fixed
extends Base
    Fixed contains the fixed holiday’s date and month. Holidays are generated on a per-year basis by applying the year, and by adjusting the date generated.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
